live_updates: Our crews have restored services to the area. Thank you for your patience!
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
62832.summary: Some customers in Pincher Creek are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
62832.title: June 19 - Pincher Creek | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
